name: places/ChIJHR8N7I1ZwokRglTcDhYzbAc
formattedAddress: 150 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 150 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012-3000, USA

originalText.text: Been using these guys almost weekly since I moved here 6 years ago - all my most special things & my day to day. Never a step wrong and a LOVELY family business. They’re the best - support your local biz! They’re the hardest workers with the highest standards on Sullivan :)

text.text: Been using these guys almost weekly since I moved here 6 years ago - all my most special things & my day to day. Never a step wrong and a LOVELY family business. They’re the best - support your local biz! They’re the hardest workers with the highest standards on Sullivan :)

originalText.text: Service is very unfriendly. They also lost my laundry many times and barely apologised. Last time they lost it— literally sent it with the wrong client and still charged me. Very disappointed considering I have been going there for a year and still gave them the benefit of the doubt. Was my mistake! They really need to up the customer service and be better. I definitely don’t trust them with my stuff now and only go there when I really need to because they are the closest laundry place to me.

text.text: Service is very unfriendly. They also lost my laundry many times and barely apologised. Last time they lost it— literally sent it with the wrong client and still charged me. Very disappointed considering I have been going there for a year and still gave them the benefit of the doubt. Was my mistake! They really need to up the customer service and be better. I definitely don’t trust them with my stuff now and only go there when I really need to because they are the closest laundry place to me.

originalText.text:
Unfriendly service, and tried to overcharge me. Told me my 9lb wash & fold bag was 10lb and quoted me $19. I took my business across the street to Cornerstone where they did it with a smile for $17.50. The price difference isn’t a big deal but the staff’s attitude difference is like night and day.

2 stars rather than 1 because the Sullivan guy pointed me across the street to Cornerstone, and that was helpful!

originalText.text: always worked well for me  early opening 7am helpful drop off laundry and pick up by 6pm   travel to ny business and my go to  !

text.text: always worked well for me  early opening 7am helpful drop off laundry and pick up by 6pm   travel to ny business and my go to  !

originalText.text: Been using Sullivan for 10 years now - they do a great job (also with tailoring) and they are reliable and honest (they often text as they are cleaning my stuff to clarify or ask questions which is really helpful). YeahHave never had an issue with any of their services or turn around times. Laundry prices are pretty standard for the neighborhood and alteration pricing always feels much more affordable than the place around the block.
